description.overview: Career represents your professional momentum, recognition, and the structure of your work life and public role.
description.detailed: This meter tracks Saturn transits to your natal Saturn and 10th house (career, public life, professional achievement). Saturn brings structure, responsibility, hard-earned success, and career tests. When Saturn forms supportive aspects, your professional efforts pay off and you build lasting career foundations. Challenging aspects create career obstacles, professional setbacks, or heavy responsibilities that feel overwhelming. Saturn retrograde reduces career pressure by 20% but can slow external momentum while deepening internal mastery.

primary_planets.saturn: Career structure, professional responsibility, hard-earned success through discipline

secondary_planets.sun: Recognition, visibility, and leadership in career
secondary_planets.mars: Career drive and assertiveness in professional life

key_houses.10: Career, public life, professional achievement, reputation, what you're known for

aspect_weights.conjunction: Maximum career impact - major professional turning points
aspect_weights.opposition: High impact - tension between career and personal life
aspect_weights.trine: High flow - professional efforts pay off naturally
aspect_weights.square: Moderate friction - career challenges that require work
aspect_weights.sextile: Moderate flow - opportunities for professional growth

interpretation_guidelines.tone: Professional and achievement-focused - talk about work, responsibility, recognition, building
interpretation_guidelines.focus_when_high: Emphasize professional momentum, putting in effort that will pay off, leadership opportunities
interpretation_guidelines.focus_when_low: Normalize career plateau periods, emphasize skill-building over visibility, patience with timing
interpretation_guidelines.focus_when_challenging: Acknowledge real career obstacles - offer long-term perspective and strategic patience

phrasing_examples.high_harmonious: Career momentum is strong today - your professional efforts are paying off and recognition is flowing your way.
phrasing_examples.moderate_mixed: Career progress requires real work today - put in the effort knowing it's building something lasting, even if rewards aren't immediate.
phrasing_examples.low_challenging: Career obstacles are real today - this plateau is temporary. Focus on skill-building and patience rather than forcing momentum that isn't there.
